headline: Dollar General Corporation (DG): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Dollar General Corporation on Rijnberk InvestInsights’s Substack by Daan | InvestInsights. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DG. Dollar General Corporation’s share was trading at $143.43 as of January 30th. DG’s trailing and forward P/E were 24.49 and 19.96 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Dollar General Corporation […]
